name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Frontend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript** to create high-performance and accessible applications. My technical expertise includes performance optimization and integrating with tools like **CDN** and **Sentry** to enhance user experiences. I am committed to mentoring junior developers, fostering effective collaboration, and driving strategic thinking to solve complex problems efficiently.

Beyond frontend development, I have a deep understanding of full-stack solutions with technologies like **Node.js**, **Next.js**, and **Flutter**. I also possess experience in cloud services such as **Azure** and **AWS**, and I've developed enterprise-grade platforms equipped with AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics. My strong foundation in microservices architecture, compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, and CI/CD automation ensures that I deliver robust, secure applications that meet business needs.
